name: Ice Cold Infinite Curling: The winter canadian sport challenge - Free Edition
name_original: Ice Cold Infinite Curling: The winter canadian sport challenge - Free Edition
description:
TRY OUR ICE COLD INFINITE CURLING: THE WINTER CANADIAN SPORT CHALLENGE GAME

All sports lover get ready for most addictive curling game. This is the game which will loved by all age group. So let’s come to the form and grab as much as fun you can.

Features
-Popular sports to all age group
-Real experience of curling game
-Cool graphics
-Easy function to play

How to play?
-Try to go as far as you can
-Avoid your rock to crashing others
-Go through the sweepers to get an extra energy and power


DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> ICE COLD INFINITE CURLING: THE WINTER CANADIAN SPORT CHALLENGE GAME
